name: Shumo Chu
content: Shumo Chu - Computer Science ResearcherI am an entreprenuer/computer scientist/angel investor. I am building a stealth mode AI startup, follow me on X and LinkedIn to know more. I have worked on database systems, cryptographically verifiable machine learning, and formal verication. I got my PhD at University of Washington, where I had the fortune to to be advised by Dan Suciu. responses with deep strategic reasoning.•Semaphore: the unsung hero behind Zuzalu Pass and Worldcoin(2023)Semaphore is your anonymous identity vault on Ethereum, powering privacy-preserving
